/usr/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/mpicc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/mpicxx -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /home/prashant/CloudMPI

-- The CXX compiler identification is GNU 9.3.0

-- Detecting C compile features - done
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/mpicxx
-- Check for working CXX compiler: /usr/bin/mpicxx -- works

-- Detecting CXX compile features - done
